title: Kylie Jenner is surprised with Krispy Kreme donuts by her employees on National Boss Day
text:
Kylie Jenner was given the gift of donuts by her loving employees on National Boss Day.

The 22 year old entrepreneur shared a video on her Instagram story, where several employees surprised her with boxes of Krispy Kreme donuts.

Jenner was certainly in high spirits after the surprise from her employees, which came after she took her daughter Stormi to a pumpkin patch in Los Angeles.

Boss: Kylie Jenner was given the gift of donuts by her loving employees on National Boss Day

Surprise: The 22 year old entrepreneur shared a video on her Instagram story, where several employees surprised her with boxes of Krispy Kreme donuts.

When her employees all exclaimed, 'Happy National Boss Day,' Jenner squealed with delight, stating, 'You guys are so cute. My favorite!'

She then opened the box, stating, 'I've gotta see them, then stating, 'Oh my goodness' after seeing the glazed donuts.

Jenner also shared a number of snaps of her and Stormi at the pumpkin patch on Instagram, stating, 'let the festivities begin.'

Surprise: When her employees all exclaimed, 'Happy National Boss Day,' Jenner squealed with delight, stating, 'You guys are so cute. My favorite!'

Donuts: She then opened the box, stating, 'I've gotta see them, then stating, 'Oh my goodness' after seeing the glazed donuts

She also took to Twitter to celebrate National Boss Day to offer some big discounts on her lip kits.

'It’s #NationalBossDay and we’re celebrating the best boss bae @kyliejenner. Today only, get 40% off Kris collection, Kylie and Boss lip kits. Ends 11:59pm pst.'

She also took to her Instagram story to tease a, 'Kylie Skin shoot happening at the offices' with a brief video.

Discount: She also took to Twitter to celebrate National Boss Day to offer some big discounts on her lip kits

Jenner is coming off her surprising break-up with rapper Travis Scott earlier this month, after two and a half years together.

Jenner and Scott started dating in April 2017, after they were both spotted hanging out together at Coachella.

Jenner gave birth to their daughter Stormi in early February 2018, and there had been talk of marriage before they announced their split earlier this month.

Break-up: Jenner is coming off her surprising break-up with rapper Travis Scott earlier this month, after two and a half years together

Sources close to the Kardashian family have also claimed that they hoped the couple would reconcile.

'Kylie and Travis are spending time together because of Stormi,' the source said. 'And they seem okay. They aren’t arguing or having any disagreements.'

'Her family wants them to be together. Travis might not be perfect, but he’s a great partner and dad. Everyone would be upset if Kylie can’t figure things out with Travis,' the source added.
description: Kylie Jenner was given the gift of donuts by her loving employees on National Boss Day.
